title: Advanced Backend Programming with Java
organization: Mentorship by Ilkin Mehdiyev (Senior Software Engineer)
description: Selected through a highly competitive process for an exclusive, advanced-level backend engineering program. Under the direct mentorship of Senior Engineer Ilkin Mehdiyev, mastered industry-standard backend development using Java and Spring Boot. The curriculum emphasized production-grade API design, scalable architecture, and real-world software engineering practices. Recognized publicly as a standout participant within a select group of high-potential developers.
